Name: LOIC
Description: LOIC is an open-source network stress testing and denial-of-service attack tool.
HTU: Download and install LOIC, configure the target URL or IP address, and start the attack.

Name: HOIC
Description: HOIC is an open-source network stress testing and denial-of-service attack tool that supports multiple targets.
HTU: Download and install HOIC, configure the target URLs or IP addresses, and start the attack.

Name: HULK
Description: HULK is a denial-of-service tool that generates unique and obfuscated HTTP traffic to saturate web servers.
HTU: Download HULK, configure the target URL, and run the script to start the attack.

Name: Slowloris
Description: Slowloris is a tool that allows a single machine to take down a web server with minimal bandwidth by holding many connections open.
HTU: Download Slowloris, configure the target server, and run the script to start the attack.

Name: Xerxes
Description: Xerxes is a powerful denial-of-service tool that can target any web server.
HTU: Download Xerxes, compile the code, configure the target server, and run the executable to start the attack.
